r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d: This is a PEAR-ified version of Useful inc's XML-RPC for PHP. It has support for HTTP transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: - Added support for sequential arrays to XML_RPC_encode() (mroch) - Cleaned up new XML_RPC_encode() changes a bit (mroch, pierre) - Remove "require_once 'PEAR.php'", include only when needed to raise an error - Replace echo and error_log() with raiseError() (mroch) - Make all classes extend XML_RPC_Base, which will handle common functions (mroch) - be tolerant of junk after methodResponse (Luca Mariano, mroch) - Silent notice even in the error log (pierre) - fix include of shared xml extension on win32 (pierre)
